text: Mattia Cadorin (mid 17th century) (also known as Bolnetta) was an Italian engraver and publisher who flourished at Padua about 1648. He engraved after Titian and others. His plates are generally marked Cadorin. ==References== * Category:Italian engravers Category:Baroque engravers Category:17th-century Italian painters Category:Italian male painters Category:Year of birth unknown Category:Year of death unknown
title: Mattia Cadorin
